message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $95 for it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay $85 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $85 just isn't enough for me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $90.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to offer $87 for the product.
Bob, I'm getting closer to your price, but I can't go lower than $89. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
